update msg_ent_metting set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vedio_id = #{vedioId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:

order by create_time desc limit ${page_start},${page_size}

group by company_id
